text: Soni chilikati cha wandu pana waakulitendelaga (isanamu kuwa) milungu (jao) kunneka Allah, ni akwinonyelaga yaakatite pakunnonyela Allah, nambo wandu wakulupilile niwali wakunnonyela Allah mwakupelenganya. Mwanti wandu walitendele lupusowo angajione ndema jachakaioneje ilagasyo (akaiweni yakogoya kusyene), ligongo machili gosope gachiwa ga Allah, soni Allah ni Jwaukali pakupeleka ilagasyo
